channel.title: Please help! my runserver does not work!
channel.description:
Sorry i no i already posted this but noone is replying and its urgent lol cos i really want server up and running.
Right when it is saying java is not recognised when i try to run a server. I have done my enviromental variables.
If this is any help my Java is located at: "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14"
I would love it if someone could tell me what to write when i click "Edit" on my Runserver.Bat
Please try to help.. All help will be appreciated and ill give Rep++
Thankyou, Jake:D
Posted on: June 26, 2009, 08:20:25 pm -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Oh yeh and it says when i open the edit section of it:
"@echo off color 0a title Lost Valentino v1 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause"

Sorry i no i already posted this but noone is replying and its urgent lol cos i really want server up and running.

I have done my enviromental variables.

If this is any help my Java is located at:
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14”

color 0a
title Lost Valentino v1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause”
